TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DependencyObject extends System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject

summary.span: 表示一个参与依赖项属性系统的对象。

span.span: Represents an object that participates in the dependency property system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类可对[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]其许多派生类启用属性系统服务。 The class enables [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] property system services on its many derived classes. 属性系统的主要功能是计算属性的值, 并提供有关已更改的值的系统通知。The property system's primary function is to compute the values of properties, and to provide system notification about values that have changed. 参与属性系统的其他键类为。Another key class that participates in the property system is . 允许将依赖属性注册到属性系统, 并提供有关每个依赖属性的标识和信息, 而作为基类使对象可以使用依赖项属性。 enables the registration of dependency properties into the property system, and provides identification and information about each dependency property, whereas as a base class enables objects to use the dependency properties. 服务和特征包括: services and characteristics include the following: - 依赖属性承载支持。Dependency property hosting support. 通过调用方法, 并将该方法的返回值存储为类中的公共静态字段, 来注册依赖属性。You register a dependency property by calling the method, and storing the method's return value as a public static field in your class. - 附加属性托管支持。Attached property hosting support. 可以通过调用方法来注册附加属性, 并将该方法的返回值存储为类中的公共静态只读字段。You register an attached property by calling the method, and storing the method's return value as a public static read-only field in your class. (还有其他成员要求; 请注意, 这表示[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]附加属性的特定实现。(There are also additional member requirements; note that this represents a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] specific implementation for attached properties. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[附加属性概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/attached-properties-overview.md)。)然后, 可以在派生自的任何类上设置附加属性。For details, see [Attached Properties Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/attached-properties-overview.md).) Your attached property can then be set on any class that derives from . - 获取、设置和清除中存在的任何依赖项属性值的实用工具方法。Get, set, and clear utility methods for values of any dependency properties that exist on the . - 元数据、强制值支持、属性更改通知和替代依赖属性或附加属性的回调。Metadata, coerce value support, property changed notification, and override callbacks for dependency properties or attached properties. 此外, 类还有助于依赖项属性的每个所有者的属性元数据。Also, the class facilitates the per-owner property metadata for a dependency property. - 派生自、 或的类的公共基类。A common base class for classes derived from , , or . (, 另一个基元素类具有包含的类层次结构。)(, another base element class, has a class hierarchy that includes .) ## Examples 下面的示例从派生, 以创建一个新的抽象类。The following example derives from to create a new abstract class. 然后, 类将注册附加属性, 并包含该附加属性的支持成员。The class then registers an attached property and includes support members for that attached property. [!code-csharp[WPFAquariumSln#DOMain](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WPFAquariumSln/CSharp/WPFAquariumObjects/Class1.cs#domain)] [!code-vb[WPFAquariumSln#DOMain](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WPFAquariumSln/visualbasic/wpfaquariumobjects/class1.vb#domain)]

summary.span: 清除属性的本地值。

span.span: Clears the local value of a property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ClearValue(class System.Windows.DependencyProperty dp) cil managed

param.name: dp
param.span: 要清除的由 对象引用指定的依赖属性。

span.span: The dependency property to be cleared, identified by a object reference.

summary.span: 清除属性的本地值。

span.span: Clears the local value of a property.

summary.span: 要清除的属性由 标识符指定。

span.span: The property to be cleared is specified by a identifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过调用来清除属性值并不一定为依赖属性指定在依赖项属性元数据中指定的默认值。Clearing the property value by calling does not necessarily give a dependency property the default value that is specified in the dependency property metadata. 清除属性仅会专门清除可能应用的任何本地值。Clearing the property only specifically clears whatever local value may have been applied. 有关详细信息，请参阅[依赖属性值优先级](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。For more information, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md). ## Examples 下面的示例循环访问所有在对象上设置了本地值的属性, 然后调用来清除每个此类属性的值。The following example iterates all properties that have local values set on an object, then calls to clear the values of each such property. [!code-csharp[DPClearValue#IterateLocalValuesAndClear](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DPClearValue/CSharp/default.xaml.cs#iteratelocalvaluesandclear)] [!code-vb[DPClearValue#IterateLocalValuesAndClear](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DPClearValue/VisualBasic/default.xaml.vb#iteratelocalvaluesandclear)]

span.span: Attempted to call on a sealed .

param.name: key
param.span: 要清除的依赖属性的关键字。

span.span: The key for the dependency property to be cleared.

summary.span: 清除只读属性的本地值。

span.span: Clears the local value of a read-only property.

summary.span: 要清除的属性由 指定。

span.span: The property to be cleared is specified by a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 标识属性系统操作的只读依赖属性。A identifies a read-only dependency property for property system operations. 定义只读依赖项属性的类不应公开此密钥的公共访问权限。Classes that define read-only dependency properties should not expose this key with public access. 公开密钥将提供一个非属性的只读字符的公共代码路径, 前提是可以在类或程序集的外部调用方法 (如或), 并引用密钥。A publicly exposed key would provide a public code pathway that negated the read-only character of the property, if methods such as or could be called outside the class or assembly, referencing the key. 通过调用来清除属性值并不一定为依赖属性指定在依赖项属性元数据中指定的默认值。Clearing the property value by calling does not necessarily give a dependency property the default value that is specified in the dependency property metadata. 清除该值仅会专门清除可能应用的任何本地值。Clearing the value only specifically clears whatever local value may have been applied. 有关详细信息，请参阅[依赖属性值优先级](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。For more information, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).

span.span: Attempted to call on a sealed .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void CoerceValue(class System.Windows.DependencyProperty dp) cil managed

param.name: dp
param.span: 要强制转换的依赖项属性的标识符。

span.span: The identifier for the dependency property to coerce.

summary.span: 对指定依赖属性的值进行强制。

span.span: Coerces the value of the specified dependency property.

summary.span: 通过对调用方 上存在的依赖属性的属性元数据中所指定的任何 函数进行调用来完成此操作。

span.span: This is accomplished by invoking any function specified in property metadata for the dependency property as it exists on the calling .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除了通过调用显式调用以外 , 每当[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]属性系统重新计算依赖属性值时, 也会在内部调用依赖属性的。In addition to being explicitly invoked through calling , the for a dependency property is also invoked internally whenever the dependency property value is being re-evaluated by the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] property system. 调用方法时, 最终将为指定的属性调用强制值回叫。When you invoke the method, you are ultimately invoking the coerce value callback for the property that you specify. 通常, 仅当知道强制值回调存在并且知道回调的强制条件时, 才会调用。Typically you will invoke only if you know that a coerce value callback exists, and if you know the callback's criteria for coercion. 调用的最常见的情况是在类处理或属性更改回调的相关属性中, 这些属性会以从属方式影响彼此的值。The most common scenario for calling is within class handling or property change callbacks of related properties that influence each other's values in a dependent way. 有关详细信息，请参阅[依赖属性回调和验证](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-callbacks-and-validation.md)。For more information, see [Dependency Property Callbacks and Validation](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-callbacks-and-validation.md). ## Examples 下面的示例在用作相同类的不同依赖属性的实现中调用。The following example calls within a implementation that is used as the for a different dependency properties on the same class. 这是在依赖属性之间引入 true 值依赖项的常见模式。This is a common pattern for introducing true value dependencies between dependency properties. [!code-csharp[DPCallbackOverride#OnPCCurrent](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DPCallbackOverride/CSharp/SDKSampleLibrary/class1.cs#onpccurrent)] [!code-vb[DPCallbackOverride#OnPCCurrent](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DPCallbackOverride/visualbasic/sdksamplelibrary/class1.vb#onpccurrent)]

exception.span: 指定的 或其值无效或不存在。

span.span: The specified or its value were invalid or do not exist.

summary.span: 获取对此实例的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] 类型进行包装的 。

value.span: 对此实例的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] 类型进行包装的 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果从方法返回的对象的返回值类型为, 并且你希望根据其类型对其执行特定于属性系统的操作, 则此属性很有用。This property is useful if an object that is returned from a method has a return value type of and you want to perform property system specific operations on it depending on its type. 例如, 使用而不[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]是类型来调用更有效。For example it is more efficient to call using the rather than the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] type. 有助于加快查找速度。 facilitates faster lookup. ## Examples 在下面的伪代码示例`MySubClass`中, 预计其他派生类可能会更改`MyCustom`依赖属性的默认值。In the following pseudocode example, `MySubClass` anticipates that additional derived classes might change the default value of the `MyCustom` dependency property. 类实现一个无参数的构造函数, 该构造函数可以通过在值上利用多态性, 只要该构造函数用作派生类 instantiator。The class implements a parameterless constructor that can determine the actual derived class by taking advantage of polymorphism on the value whenever that constructor is used as a derived class instantiator. `public DOClass() : base()` `{` `__customPropertyCache = (CustomDP)` `CustomDPProperty.GetMetadata(DependencyObjectType).DefaultValue;` `}`

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance valuetype System.Windows.LocalValueEnumerator GetLocalValueEnumerator() cil managed

summary.span: 创建一个专用的枚举数，用于确定哪些依赖项属性在此 上具有以本地方式设置的值。

span.span: Creates a specialized enumerator for determining which dependency properties have locally set values on this .

returns.span: 一个专用的本地值枚举数。

span.span: A specialized local value enumerator.

remarks.format: ## Remarks *本地值*是由设置的任何依赖属性值, 而不是属性系统的其他方面。A *local value* is any dependency property value that was set by , as opposed to other aspects of the property system. 通过调用获取的可用于枚举在实例上具有本地设置的值的属性。The obtained by calling can be used to enumerate properties that have a locally set value on a instance. 每个这样的属性都由一个对象在枚举器中表示, 该对象的属性引用特定的及其值。Each such property is represented in the enumerator by a object, which has properties that reference the specific and its values. 这种枚举本地集值的方法可用于优化或用于本地值的其他处理, 例如, 确定的哪些属性值会更改 (如果它们已被清除)。This technique of enumerating over the locally set values can be used for optimization or for other handling of local values, such as to determine which property values of a would change if they were cleared. > [!IMPORTANT] > 返回的可能包含只读依赖项属性的记录或属性系统计算值的依赖项属性。The returned might contain records for dependency properties that are read-only, or dependency properties where values are calculated by the property system. 例如, 具有通过布局建立的宽度的视觉框架元素将报告的本地值。For example, a visual framework element that has an established width through layout will report a local value for . 如果你正在获取本地值来重置它们, 请检查每个的属性标识符上的值, 以验证问题是否不是只读的。If you are getting local values in order to reset them, check the value on the property identifier of each to verify that the in question is not read-only. ## Examples 下面的示例循环访问所有在对象上设置了本地值的属性, 然后调用来清除每个此类属性的值。The following example iterates all properties that have local values set on an object, then calls to clear the values of each such property. [!code-csharp[DPClearValue#IterateLocalValuesAndClear](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DPClearValue/CSharp/default.xaml.cs#iteratelocalvaluesandclear)] [!code-vb[DPClearValue#IterateLocalValuesAndClear](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DPClearValue/VisualBasic/default.xaml.vb#iteratelocalvaluesandclear)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance object GetValue(class System.Windows.DependencyProperty dp) cil managed
Public Function GetValue (dp As DependencyProperty) As Object

param.name: dp
param.span: 要为其检索值的属性的 标识符。

span.span: The identifier of the property to retrieve the value for.

summary.span: 对 的此实例返回依赖属性的当前有效值。

span.span: Returns the current effective value of a dependency property on this instance of a .
Returns the current effective value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks *有效的值*是属性系统返回给请求该值的任何调用方的属性的值。The *effective value* is the value of the property that is returned by the property system to any caller that is requesting the value. 有效的值是属性系统计算所有可能的输入, 这些输入都参与属性系统值的优先级。The effective value is the result of the property system having evaluated all the possible inputs that participate in the property system value precedence. 这包括强制和动画。This includes coercion and animation. 有关详细信息，请参阅[依赖属性值优先级](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。For more information, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md). 此方法将永远不会返回。This method will never return . 是属性系统的一个 sentinel 值, 可在内部使用并偶尔通过强制回调公开。The is a sentinel value for the property system that is used in various capacities internally and occasionally also exposed through coercion callbacks. 如果不确定属性的类型, 则可以查询请求的依赖项属性的标识符, 以确定是否有更具体的返回值可以转换为。If you are not sure what the property's type should be, you can query the identifier of the requested dependency property to determine whether there is a more specific that the return value can be converted to.

exception.span: 指定的 或其值无效，或者指定的 不存在。

span.span: The specified or its value was invalid, or the specified does not exist.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void InvalidateProperty(class System.Windows.DependencyProperty dp) cil managed

param.name: dp
param.span: 要使其失效的属性的 标识符。

span.span: The identifier of the property to invalidate.

summary.span: 重新计算指定依赖项属性的有效值

span.span: Re-evaluates the effective value for the specified dependency property

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用时, 可能会调用为该依赖属性注册的任何关联的和适用的或函数。When you call , any associated and applicable or functions registered for that dependency property might be invoked. 对设置了本地值的属性调用将不起作用, 因为本地值优先于其他属性系统输入, 动画除外。Calling on a property that has its local value set will have no effect, because the local value takes precedence over other property system inputs, except for animations. 但是, 您可以调用, 然后调用。However, you could call , then call . 有关详细信息，请参阅[依赖属性值优先级](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。For more information, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md). 调用不一定适用于许多依赖属性方案。Calling is not necessarily applicable for many dependency property scenarios. 如果因任何组成部分中的值发生更改而导致依赖属性无效, 则属性系统将使该依赖属性自动失效并重新计算该属性。If a dependency property becomes invalidated because of value changes in any of the constituents, the property system invalidates and re-evaluates the dependency property automatically. 但仍有一些适合的方案 。However, there are still some appropriate scenarios where is useful. 特别是, 可以在其他依赖属性的强制值或属性更改回调内使用。In particular, you can use inside the coerce value or property changed callback for a different dependency property. 你还可以使用来对无法实现建议的通知机制的数据源 (可能是如果使用无法从派生的数据类, 或者数据为静态的数据源) 强制重新计算绑定成员)。You can also use to force re-evaluation of a binding against a data source that is not able to implement the recommended notification mechanism (perhaps if consuming data classes that cannot be derived from, or where the data is a static member). ## Examples 下面的示例在自定义属性上调用, 而在属性的计算中涉及的属性发生变化时。The following example calls on a custom property, whenever properties that are involved in the invalidated property's calculations change. 这是一种调用方法的替代方法, 因为使属性失效还会调用任何已注册的。This is an alternative technique to calling the method, because invalidating the property will also call any registered . [!code-csharp[PropertySystemEsoterics#InvalidateProperty](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertySystemEsoterics/CSharp/SDKSampleLibrary/class1.cs#invalidateproperty)] [!code-vb[PropertySystemEsoterics#InvalidateProperty](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertySystemEsoterics/visualbasic/sdksamplelibrary/class1.vb#invalidateproperty)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnPropertyChanged(valuetype System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnPropertyChanged (e As DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs)
abstract member OnPropertyChanged : System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs -> unit override this.OnPropertyChanged : System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs -> unit

param.name: e
param.span: 将包含相关依赖项属性标识符、类型的属性元数据以及旧值和新值的事件数据。

span.span: Event data that will contain the dependency property identifier of interest, the property metadata for the type, and old and new values.

summary.span: 每当更新此 的任何依赖属性的有效值时调用。

span.span: Invoked whenever the effective value of any dependency property on this has been updated.

summary.span: 更改的特定依赖项属性将在事件数据中报告。

span.span: The specific dependency property that changed is reported in the event data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法通常不用于检测单个属性更改, 也不会对每个案例执行属性失效。This method is not intended to generally detect individual property changes or perform invalidations of properties on a per-case basis. 用于修改常规失效模式, 前提是了解有关属性的广泛分类的信息。 is instead intended for modifications of the general invalidation pattern, if certain information is known about wide classifications of properties. 例如, 中的更改可能是的值类型发生更改, 也可能是子属性, 其中的更改在其他引用内。For example, changes in a might be changes in the value types of the , or might be subproperties, where the changes are within other references. 的重写实现使用内部信息来确定属性是否为子属性, 并为任意一种情况提供适当的基类逻辑。The override implementation of uses internal information to determine whether the properties are subproperties, and provides appropriate base class logic for either case. 在对象的整个生存期内, 可能会多次调用。 is potentially invoked many times during the life of an object. 因此, 如果你重写特定属性的元数据, 然后为单个属性附加或函数, 则可以为整个属性系统获得更好的性能。Therefore, you can achieve better performance for the overall property system if you override the metadata of specific properties and then attach or functions for individual properties. 但是, 如果包含大量与值相关的依赖项属性, 则可以使用此方法, 或者, 如果包含的逻辑 (如呈现行为) 必须针对属性失效的几个相关事例重新运行, 则应使用此方法。However, you would use this method if a includes a significant number of value-interrelated dependency properties, or if it includes logic such as rendering behavior that must be rerun for several related cases of property invalidations.

span.span: Always call the base implementation.

para.span: 如果不这样做, 将明显禁用整个[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]属性系统, 从而导致报告错误的值。

span.span: Failure to do this will significantly disable the entire [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] property system, causing incorrect values to be reported.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance object ReadLocalValue(class System.Windows.DependencyProperty dp) cil managed
Public Function ReadLocalValue (dp As DependencyProperty) As Object

param.name: dp
param.span: 要为其检索值的属性的 标识符。

span.span: The identifier of the property to retrieve the value for.

summary.span: 如果存在，则返回依赖属性的本地值。

span.span: Returns the local value of a dependency property, if it exists.

returns.span: 返回本地值，或在未设置本地值的情况下返回 sentinel 值 。

span.span: Returns the local value, or returns the sentinel value if no local value is set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于依赖属性 , 您应使用最典型的 "get" 操作。You should use for most typical "get" operations for a dependency property. 如果值不是本地设置的, 则不会返回有效的值。 does not return the effective value for a variety of circumstances where the value was not locally set. 由 "样式"、"主题"、"模板"、"元数据" 或 "属性值继承" 的默认值设置的值不被视为本地值。Values that are set by styles, themes, templates, the default value from metadata, or property value inheritance are not considered to be local values. 但是, 在计算绑定和其他表达式后, 它们被视为本地值。However, bindings and other expressions are considered to be local values, after they have been evaluated. 如果未设置本地值, 则此方法返回。When no local value is set, this method returns . 如果返回的值不是, 则可以查询请求的依赖项属性的元数据, 以确定是否有更具体的类型可以将返回值转换为。If the returned value is other than , you can query the metadata of the requested dependency property to determine whether there is a more specific type that the return value can be converted to.

span.span: The identifier of the dependency property to set.
The new local value.

summary.span: 设置依赖属性的值而不更改其值源。

span.span: Sets the value of a dependency property without changing its value source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由组件使用, 该组件以编程方式设置其自己的属性之一的值, 而无需禁用应用程序声明的属性用法。This method is used by a component that programmatically sets the value of one of its own properties without disabling an application's declared use of the property. 方法可更改属性的有效值, 但现有触发器、数据绑定和样式将继续工作。The method changes the effective value of the property, but existing triggers, data bindings, and styles will continue to work.

exception.span: 尝试修改只读依赖项属性，或尝试修改密封 上的属性。

span.span: Attempted to modify a read-only dependency property, or a property on a sealed .

exception.span: 的类型不是为 属性注册时使用的正确类型。

span.span: was not the correct type as registered for the property.

summary.span: 设置依赖属性的本地值。

span.span: Sets the local value of a dependency property.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetValue (System.Windows.DependencyProperty dp, object value);

Public Sub SetValue (dp As DependencyProperty, value As Object)

The new local value.

summary.span: 设置依赖属性的本地值，该值由其依赖属性标识符指定。

span.span: Sets the local value of a dependency property, specified by its dependency property identifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果提供的类型与最初注册依赖属性时所声明的类型不匹配, 则会引发异常。If the provided type does not match the type that is declared for the dependency property as it was originally registered, an exception is thrown. 应始终将参数提供为适当的类型。 `value`The `value` parameter should always be provided as the appropriate type. 在所设置的依赖项属性的依赖项属性标识符上存在回调时, 异常情况可能会受到影响。The exception conditions are potentially influenced by the callback that exists on the dependency property identifier of the dependency property being set. 否则, 提供的值可能会失败, 一般类型检查条件 (例如, 在本机类型为 Double 时传递字符串)。Otherwise, the value provided might be failing general type-checking conditions (for example, passing a string when the native type is Double).

exception.span: 尝试修改只读依赖项属性，或尝试修改密封 上的属性。

span.span: Attempted to modify a read-only dependency property, or a property on a sealed .

exception.span: 的类型不是为 属性注册时使用的正确类型。

span.span: was not the correct type as registered for the property.

The new local value.

summary.span: 设置一个只读依赖属性的本地值，该值由依赖属性的 标识符指定。

span.span: Sets the local value of a read-only dependency property, specified by the identifier of the dependency property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你为自定义类定义的只读依赖项属性设置值时, 通常使用此签名。This signature is generally used when you set values for read-only dependency properties that are defined by your custom classes. 通常, 仅从注册该依赖项属性的类型调用, 后者实现为依赖属性提供确定值的内部逻辑。Generally, is called only from the type that registered that dependency property, which implements the internal logic that provides the determined value for the dependency property. 有关详细信息，请参阅[只读依赖属性](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/read-only-dependency-properties.md)。For more information, see [Read-Only Dependency Properties](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/read-only-dependency-properties.md). 如果提供的类型与最初注册依赖属性时所声明的类型不匹配, 则会引发异常。If the provided type does not match the type that is declared for the dependency property as it was originally registered, an exception is thrown. 应始终将参数提供为适当的类型。 `value`The `value` parameter should always be provided as the appropriate type. 在所设置的依赖项属性的依赖项属性标识符上存在回调时, 异常情况可能会受到影响。The exception conditions are potentially influenced by the callback that exists on the dependency property identifier of the dependency property being set. ## Examples 下面的示例定义了一个只读依赖项属性, 以及一个`public static readonly` 为属性使用者提供了必需的只读公开的, 以及[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]包装的 get 访问器。The following example defines a read-only dependency property, along with a `public static readonly` that provides necessary read-only exposure to property consumers, and the get accessor for the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] wrapper. [!code-csharp[WPFAquariumSln#RODP](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WPFAquariumSln/CSharp/WPFAquariumObjects/Class1.cs#rodp)] [!code-vb[WPFAquariumSln#RODP](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WPFAquariumSln/visualbasic/wpfaquariumobjects/class1.vb#rodp)]

span.span: if the dependency property that is supplied should be value-serialized; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果依赖属性在`true` 上建立了一个本地值, 则默认实现将返回。The default implementation returns `true` for all cases in which a dependency property had a local value established on the .

para.span: 此方法的替代可能以不同方式处理特定依赖属性。

span.span: Overrides for this method might handle specific dependency properties differently.
